description: These stuffed peppers are full of sunny Greek flavours and perfect served with pita breads and a green salad.
keywords: Greek Style Stuffed Peppers with Feta & Pita
name: Greek Style Stuffed Peppers with Feta & Pita Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Brush the pita breads with oil and a pinch of oregano and place in a grill pan on a high heat for 2 minutes on each side, until slightly charred. Serve with the capsicums.
